ingredients.ingredient: 8 slices bacon, cut into bite-size pieces
1 small red onion, chopped, or more to taste
3 cloves garlic, minced, or more to taste
½ teaspoon celery salt, or more to taste
1 bay leaf, or more to taste
freshly ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Render bacon slowly until crispy, then reserve on paper towels; keep 2 tablespoons of fat for sautéing aromatics
Chop green tomatoes into similar-sized pieces so they cook evenly in the broth
Simmer the soup gently for 20-25 minutes to allow green tomato flavor to develop without becoming mushy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Encourage the user to taste throughout cooking and adjust seasoning; green tomatoes can be tart, so balance with salt and sugar if needed.
